body:
When AI plays Brainstorm, the game log displays the cards placed on the top of their deck - In fact it says "From your hand to the top of your library" along with displaying the card name.

I understand that it's handy for debugging, but as intended?
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Opponent's Brainstorm reveals their replaced cards.

comments.body: I can't believe this is correct. Possibly we need to distinguish between what gets shown in the UI log and what gets saved to the game.log file.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
